# defaultConfiguration

**Instance Property**

The default configuration, if you don’t explicitly set one.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultConfiguration: Entity.ConfigurationCatalog.Configuration { get }
```

## Accessing configurations in a configuration set

- **configurations**: The alternative configurations that are available in a set.
